title: Other personal service activities (PKD 96)
paragraphs: Additional services connected with personal support for drivers, employees and partners.
Non-core activities which improve comfort, safety and quality of cooperation.
Can include support in travel organisation, personal consulting and related services.
points: Assistance for drivers and staff in everyday matters during international trips.
Help for foreign partners visiting Poland (basic logistics and coordination).
Flexible personal services agreed individually with long-term partners.
